entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
BREEZY AND NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, DIMINISHING TO 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 40
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 40
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 50

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
